title: axom ^conduit@0.7.2 build fails: FindConduit.cmake: can't find conduit
body:
`axom@0.4.0` build fails when using `conduit@0.7.2` using:
* `spack@develop` (7febe23ebcb33932661b6736be87969e465f867e from `Wed May 19 14:05:24 2021 -0700`)
* Ubuntu 20.04 GCC 9.3.0
* Ubuntu 18.04 GCC 7.5.0
* RHEL 7 GCC 9.3.0
* RHEL 8 GCC 8.3.1

Concrete spec: [axom.spec.yaml.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/6511719/axom.spec.yaml.txt)
Build log: [axom-build-out.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/6511723/axom-build-out.txt)

Reproduced inside Docker container image `ecpe4s/ubuntu20.04-runner-x86_64:2021-05-15`
```
$> git clone https://github.com/spack/spack
$> (cd spack && git checkout 7febe23ebc)

$> spack mirror add E4S https://cache.e4s.io
$> spack buildcache keys -it
OK

$> spack install --cache-only --only dependencies --include-build-deps -f ./axom.spec.yaml
OK

$> spack install --no-cache -f ./axom.spec.yaml
...
==> Installing axom-0.4.0-3e5ftk6etwk7vhomigezruqdfq5cgibz
==> Ran patch() for axom
==> axom: Executing phase: 'initconfig'
==> axom: Executing phase: 'cmake'
==> Error: ProcessError: Command exited with status 1:
    'cmake' '-G' 'Unix Makefiles' '-DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX:STRING=/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu20.04-x86_64/gcc-9.3.0/axom-0.4.0-3e5ftk6etwk7vhomigezruqdfq5cgibz' '-DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE:STRING=RelWithDebInfo' '-DCMAKE_INTERPROCEDURAL_OPTIMIZATION:BOOL=OFF' '-DCMAKE_VERBOSE_MAKEFILE:BOOL=ON' '-DCMAKE_INSTALL_RPATH_USE_LINK_PATH:BOOL=OFF' '-DCMAKE_INSTALL_RPATH:STRING=/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu20.04-x86_64/gcc-9.3.0/axom-0.4.0-3e5ftk6etwk7vhomigezruqdfq5cgibz/lib;/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu20.04-x86_64/gcc-9.3.0/axom-0.4.0-3e5ftk6etwk7vhomigezruqdfq5cgibz/lib64;/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu20.04-x86_64/gcc-9.3.0/conduit-0.7.2-z57346wkcbktol7blqmmq2lpumvdmrrr/lib;/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu20.04-x86_64/gcc-9.3.0/hdf5-1.8.22-szvspwn2f255tmyazcdcsyfutiyngszh/lib;/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu20.04-x86_64/gcc-9.3.0/mpich-3.4.1-frmqmomelxuruw6djdqwxtmdlqn7kb72/lib;/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu20.04-x86_64/gcc-9.3.0/hwloc-2.4.1-q6hzuh4lmnlthnlqphvvyuk557hej35c/lib;/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu20.04-x86_64/gcc-9.3.0/libpciaccess-0.16-ux5xkhgfhhmitpkxfuf5h6ooudsiwhd4/lib;/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu20.04-x86_64/gcc-9.3.0/libxml2-2.9.10-qlt5ajqqmtin3atqcycnv67oex63cvny/lib;/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu20.04-x86_64/gcc-9.3.0/libiconv-1.16-w6zptbclncs3jsnl3i4qtg72fgheiwdf/lib;/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu20.04-x86_64/gcc-9.3.0/xz-5.2.5-ynkyqliadxgrqpk4mavevv3onehjrdco/lib;/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu20.04-x86_64/gcc-9.3.0/zlib-1.2.11-p7dmb5pqi6svirhovljrkp3uyfiytz3m/lib;/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu20.04-x86_64/gcc-9.3.0/ncurses-6.2-n5vhymfigwg6e45k7thdfyeswuhxojtx/lib;/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu20.04-x86_64/gcc-9.3.0/libfabric-1.12.1-3g6fqlndfhmx2qqsgbk7ptfe7qv7tb65/lib;/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu20.04-x86_64/gcc-9.3.0/lua-5.3.5-xgdyl636qj2wrcylr5256xgxsjpmjybv/lib;/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu20.04-x86_64/gcc-9.3.0/readline-8.1-fvag4vkcyipnv5vihjke24xs4rz26opn/lib;/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu20.04-x86_64/gcc-9.3.0/raja-0.13.0-l22sfjknjzhqf6vxsr34apzqkmz3zixd/lib;/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu20.04-x86_64/gcc-9.3.0/camp-0.1.0-cmr4rmbw36urn2b72ghkesab3qepb3iz/lib;/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu20.04-x86_64/gcc-9.3.0/umpire-4.1.2-ofzdoemhytkqvaq4vaeifnarrdhfo6ep/lib' '-DCMAKE_PREFIX_PATH:STRING=/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu20.04-x86_64/gcc-9.3.0/cmake-3.20.2-r5aseli7qzflnjylx6jxh2t7mh56md2t;/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu20.04-x86_64/gcc-9.3.0/conduit-0.7.2-z57346wkcbktol7blqmmq2lpumvdmrrr;/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu20.04-x86_64/gcc-9.3.0/hdf5-1.8.22-szvspwn2f255tmyazcdcsyfutiyngszh;/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu20.04-x86_64/gcc-9.3.0/lua-5.3.5-xgdyl636qj2wrcylr5256xgxsjpmjybv;/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu20.04-x86_64/gcc-9.3.0/mpich-3.4.1-frmqmomelxuruw6djdqwxtmdlqn7kb72;/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu20.04-x86_64/gcc-9.3.0/raja-0.13.0-l22sfjknjzhqf6vxsr34apzqkmz3zixd;/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu20.04-x86_64/gcc-9.3.0/umpire-4.1.2-ofzdoemhytkqvaq4vaeifnarrdhfo6ep' '-C' '/tmp/root/spack-stage/spack-stage-axom-0.4.0-3e5ftk6etwk7vhomigezruqdfq5cgibz/spack-src/0a99730195e0-linux-ubuntu20.04-x86_64-gcc@9.3.0.cmake' '-DENABLE_TESTS=OFF' '-DBUILD_SHARED_LIBS:BOOL=ON' '/tmp/root/spack-stage/spack-stage-axom-0.4.0-3e5ftk6etwk7vhomigezruqdfq5cgibz/spack-src/src'

1 error found in build log:
     89    -- HDF5 Definitions:
     90    -- HDF5 is parallel:  TRUE
     91    -- HDF5 using HDF5_DEFINITIONS + HDF5_INCLUDE_DIRS + HDF5_LIBRARIES

           ib-1.2.11-p7dmb5pqi6svirhovljrkp3uyfiytz3m/include
     94    -- HDF5_LIBRARIES:    /spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu20.04-x86_64/gcc-9.3.0/hdf5-1.8.22-szvspwn2f255tmyazcdcsyfutiyngszh/lib/libhdf5.a;/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu20.04-x86_64/gcc-9.
```

@cyrush @white238
